name: Prince of Throne: Royal Battleground
description:
Prince Simon is now mature enough to get married. Since his father, King Armon knew that his son is interested in men so he arranges a tournament to find the bravest warrior to marry his beatiful son.

Hadrain had join the tournament to fight for his beloved Prince Simon. He must defeat 8 tough warriors before he can marry Prince Simon and live together forever.

NOTE: You can finish the game in FREE VERSION but you can't RETRY battles.
